1: רָנִּ֥י <sup>7442 </sup> <n>Sing</n> עֲקָרָ֖ה <sup>6135 </sup> <n>O barren</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יָלָ֑דָה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>thou [that] didst not bear</n> פִּצְחִ֨י <sup>6476 </sup> <n>break forth</n> רִנָּ֤ה <sup>7440 </sup> <n>into singing</n> וְצַהֲלִי֙ <sup>6670 </sup> <n>and cry aloud</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> חָ֔לָה <sup>2342 </sup> <n>thou [that] didst not travail with child</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> רַבִּ֧ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>for more</n> בְּֽנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[are] the children</n> שׁוֹמֵמָ֛ה <sup>8074 </sup> <n>of the desolate</n> מִבְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>than the children</n> בְעוּלָ֖ה <sup>1166 </sup> <n>of the married wife</n> אָמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
2: הַרְחִ֣יבִי ׀ <sup>7337 </sup> <n>Enlarge</n> מְק֣וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>the place</n> אָהֳלֵ֗ךְ <sup>168 </sup> <n>of thy tent</n> וִירִיע֧וֹת <sup>3407 </sup> <n>the curtains</n> מִשְׁכְּנוֹתַ֛יִךְ <sup>4908 </sup> <n>of thine habitations</n> יַטּ֖וּ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>and let them stretch forth</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תַּחְשֹׂ֑כִי <sup>2820 </sup> <n>spare</n> הַאֲרִ֙יכִי֙ <sup>748 </sup> <n>not lengthen</n> מֵֽיתָרַ֔יִךְ <sup>4340 </sup> <n>thy cords</n> וִיתֵדֹתַ֖יִךְ <sup>3489 </sup> <n>thy stakes</n> חַזֵּֽקִי׃ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>and strengthen</n>
3: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יָמִ֥ין <sup>3225 </sup> <n>on the right hand</n> וּשְׂמֹ֖אול <sup>8040 </sup> <n>and on the left</n> תִּפְרֹ֑צִי <sup>6555 </sup> <n>For thou shalt break forth</n> וְזַרְעֵךְ֙ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>and thy seed</n> גּוֹיִ֣ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>the Gentiles</n> יִירָ֔שׁ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>shall inherit</n> וְעָרִ֥ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> נְשַׁמּ֖וֹת <sup>8074 </sup> <n>and make the desolate</n> יוֹשִֽׁיבוּ׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>to be inhabited</n>
4: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תִּֽירְאִי֙ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>Fear</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תֵב֔וֹשִׁי <sup>954 </sup> <n>not for thou shalt not be ashamed</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּכָּלְמִ֖י <sup>3637 </sup> <n>neither be thou confounded</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תַחְפִּ֑ירִי <sup>2659 </sup> <n>for thou shalt not be put to shame</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בֹ֤שֶׁת <sup>1322 </sup> <n>the shame</n> עֲלוּמַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>5934 </sup> <n>of thy youth</n> תִּשְׁכָּ֔חִי <sup>7911 </sup> <n>for thou shalt forget</n> וְחֶרְפַּ֥ת <sup>2781 </sup> <n>the reproach</n> אַלְמְנוּתַ֖יִךְ <sup>491 </sup> <n>of thy widowhood</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תִזְכְּרִי־ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>and shalt not remember</n> עֽוֹד׃ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>more</n>
5: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> בֹעֲלַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>1166 </sup> <n>[is] thine husband</n> עֹשַׂ֔יִךְ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>For thy Maker</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> צְבָא֖וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> שְׁמ֑וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>[is] his name</n> וְגֹֽאֲלֵךְ֙ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>and thy Redeemer</n> קְד֣וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>the Holy One</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֱלֹהֵ֥י <sup>430 </sup> <n>The God</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the whole earth</n> יִקָּרֵֽא׃ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>shall he be called</n>
6: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> כְאִשָּׁ֧ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>thee as a woman</n> עֲזוּבָ֛ה <sup>5805 </sup> <n>forsaking</n> וַעֲצ֥וּבַת <sup>6087 </sup> <n>and grieved</n> ר֖וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>in spirit</n> קְרָאָ֣ךְ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>hath called</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> וְאֵ֧שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>and a wife</n> נְעוּרִ֛ים <sup>5271 </sup> <n>of youth</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> תִמָּאֵ֖ס <sup>3988 </sup> <n>when thou wast refused</n> אָמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n>
7: בְּרֶ֥גַע <sup>7281 </sup> <n>moment</n> קָטֹ֖ן <sup>6996 </sup> <n>For a small</n> עֲזַבְתִּ֑יךְ <sup>5800 </sup> <n>have I forsaken</n> וּבְרַחֲמִ֥ים <sup>7356 </sup> <n>mercies</n> גְּדֹלִ֖ים <sup>1419 </sup> <n>thee but with great</n> אֲקַבְּצֵֽךְ׃ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>will I gather</n>
8: בְּשֶׁ֣צֶף <sup>8241 </sup> <n>In a little</n> קֶ֗צֶף <sup>7110 </sup> <n>wrath</n> הִסְתַּ֨רְתִּי <sup>5641 </sup> <n>I hid</n> פָנַ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>my face</n> רֶ֙גַע֙ <sup>7281 </sup> <n>from thee for a moment</n> מִמֵּ֔ךְ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> וּבְחֶ֥סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>kindness</n> עוֹלָ֖ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>but with everlasting</n> רִֽחַמְתִּ֑יךְ <sup>7355 </sup> <n>will I have mercy</n> אָמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>on thee saith</n> גֹּאֲלֵ֖ךְ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>thy Redeemer</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> ס
9: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> מֵ֥י <sup>4325 </sup> <n>For this [is as] the waters</n> נֹ֙חַ֙ <sup>5146 </sup> <n>of Noah</n> זֹ֣את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> לִ֔י אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>When</n> נִשְׁבַּ֗עְתִּי <sup>7650 </sup> <n>unto me for [as] I have sworn</n> מֵעֲבֹ֥ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>should no more go over</n> מֵי־ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>that the waters</n> נֹ֛חַ <sup>5146 </sup> <n>of Noah</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> כֵּ֥ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>So</n> נִשְׁבַּ֛עְתִּי <sup>7650 </sup> <n>so have I sworn</n> מִקְּצֹ֥ף <sup>7107 </sup> <n>that I would not be wroth</n> עָלַ֖יִךְ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וּמִגְּעָר־ <sup>1605 </sup> <n>with thee nor rebuke</n> בָּֽךְ׃
10: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הֶֽהָרִים֙ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>For the mountains</n> יָמ֔וּשׁוּ <sup>4185 </sup> <n>shall depart</n> וְהַגְּבָע֖וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>and the hills</n> תְּמוּטֶ֑נָה <sup>4131 </sup> <n>be removed</n> וְחַסְדִּ֞י <sup>2617 </sup> <n>but my kindness</n> מֵאִתֵּ֣ךְ <sup>853 </sup> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָמ֗וּשׁ <sup>4185 </sup> <n>shall not depart</n> וּבְרִ֤ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>from thee neither shall the covenant</n> שְׁלוֹמִי֙ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>of my peace</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תָמ֔וּט <sup>4131 </sup> <n>be removed</n> אָמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saith</n> מְרַחֲמֵ֖ךְ <sup>7355 </sup> <n>that hath mercy</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> ס
11: עֲנִיָּ֥ה <sup>6041 </sup> <n>O thou afflicted</n> סֹעֲרָ֖ה <sup>5590 </sup> <n>tossed with tempest</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נֻחָ֑מָה <sup>5162 </sup> <n>[and] not comforted</n> הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אָנֹכִ֜י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מַרְבִּ֤יץ <sup>7257 </sup> <n>behold I will lay</n> בַּפּוּךְ֙ <sup>6320 </sup> <n>with fair colours</n> אֲבָנַ֔יִךְ <sup>68 </sup> <n>thy stones</n> וִיסַדְתִּ֖יךְ <sup>3245 </sup> <n>and lay thy foundations</n> בַּסַּפִּירִֽים׃ <sup>5601 </sup> <n>with sapphires</n>
12: וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <sup>7760 </sup> <n>And I will make</n> כַּֽדְכֹד֙ <sup>3539 </sup> <n>of agates</n> שִׁמְשֹׁתַ֔יִךְ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>thy windows</n> וּשְׁעָרַ֖יִךְ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>and thy gates</n> לְאַבְנֵ֣י <sup>68 </sup> <n>stones</n> אֶקְדָּ֑ח <sup>688 </sup> <n>of crystal</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and your entire</n> גְּבוּלֵ֖ךְ <sup>1366 </sup> <n>and all thy borders</n> לְאַבְנֵי־ <sup>68 </sup> <n>stones</n> חֵֽפֶץ׃ <sup>2656 </sup> <n>of pleasant</n>
13: וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> בָּנַ֖יִךְ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>And all thy children</n> לִמּוּדֵ֣י <sup>3928 </sup> <n>[shall be] taught</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְרַ֖ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and great</n> שְׁל֥וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>[shall be] the peace</n> בָּנָֽיִךְ׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of thy children</n>
14: בִּצְדָקָ֖ה <sup>6666 </sup> <n>In righteousness</n> תִּכּוֹנָ֑נִי <sup>3559 </sup> <n>shalt thou be established</n> רַחֲקִ֤י <sup>7368 </sup> <n>thou shalt be far</n> מֵעֹ֙שֶׁק֙ <sup>6233 </sup> <n>from oppression</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>you will not</n> תִירָ֔אִי <sup>3372 </sup> <n>for thou shalt not fear</n> וּמִ֨מְּחִתָּ֔ה <sup>4288 </sup> <n>and from terror</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>it will not</n> תִקְרַ֖ב <sup>7126 </sup> <n>for it shall not come near</n> אֵלָֽיִךְ׃ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n>
15: הֵ֣ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>If</n> גּ֥וֹר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>Behold they shall surely</n> יָג֛וּר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>gather together</n> אֶ֖פֶס <sup>657 </sup> <n>[but] not</n> מֵֽאוֹתִ֑י <sup>853 </sup> מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>by me whosoever</n> גָ֥ר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>shall gather together</n> אִתָּ֖ךְ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> עָלַ֥יִךְ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>because</n> יִפּֽוֹל׃ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>against thee shall fall</n>
16: [הֵן כ] (הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> ק) אָֽנֹכִי֙ <sup>595 </sup> <n>Myself</n> בָּרָ֣אתִי <sup>1254 </sup> <n>Behold I have created</n> חָרָ֔שׁ <sup>2796 </sup> <n>the smith</n> נֹפֵ֙חַ֙ <sup>5301 </sup> <n>that bloweth</n> בְּאֵ֣שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>in the fire</n> פֶּחָ֔ם <sup>6352 </sup> <n>the coals</n> וּמוֹצִ֥יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and that bringeth forth</n> כְלִ֖י <sup>3627 </sup> <n>an instrument</n> לְמַעֲשֵׂ֑הוּ <sup>4639 </sup> <n>for his work</n> וְאָנֹכִ֛י <sup>595 </sup> <n>Myself</n> בָּרָ֥אתִי <sup>1254 </sup> <n>and I have created</n> מַשְׁחִ֖ית <sup>7843 </sup> <n>the waster</n> לְחַבֵּֽל׃ <sup>2254 </sup> <n>to destroy</n>
17: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> כְּלִ֞י <sup>3627 </sup> <n>No weapon</n> יוּצַ֤ר <sup>3335 </sup> <n>that is formed</n> עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִצְלָ֔ח <sup>6743 </sup> <n>against thee shall prosper</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> לָשׁ֛וֹן <sup>3956 </sup> <n>and every tongue</n> תָּֽקוּם־ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>[that] shall rise</n> אִתָּ֥ךְ <sup>854 </sup> <n>in</n> לַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>against thee in judgment</n> תַּרְשִׁ֑יעִי <sup>7561 </sup> <n>thou shalt condemn</n> זֹ֡את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> נַחֲלַת֩ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>This [is] the heritage</n> עַבְדֵ֨י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>of the servants</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְצִדְקָתָ֛ם <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and their righteousness</n> מֵאִתִּ֖י <sup>853 </sup> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>[is] of me saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> ס
